content: learn to make a mini pumpkin with this free and easy amigurumi crochet pattern for this pattern you will need -worsted weight yarn size 4 -polyester fiber fill -3 75mm crochet hook -yarn needle -scissors -stitch markers -pins abbreviations magic_ring- magic_ring st- stitch single_crochet- single_crochet increase- increase single_crochet twice in one stitch decrease- decrease single_crochet two stitches together blo- single_crochet in back loops only
